name: Firefly’s Venture
description:
Firefly’s Venture is a side-scrolling adventure platformer set in a fantastic world.

A little firefly is curious about everything, and always spends a whole day wandering around. But one day, he loses his way in an alien world. The perilous environment is fraught with numerous moving obstacles and tricky traps. His head’s spinning and wonder where the exit is.

After a while, however, he realizes that fear doesn’t help the situation at all. Only courage and agility can bring him home! Thus, he must be brave enough to fight against the dangers ahead. Come on, little firefly!

How to Survive:
- Tap anywhere on the screen to fly
- Avoid obstacles nimbly
- Fly as far as you can

Thanks to its simple control and easy rules, the game is instantly accessible and entertaining! But remember that your reaction and skill are crucial to fly farther! Get it and see how far you can get!
